main event: A bright red glowing object was observed moving across the sky at a high speed and leaving a grayish vapor trail.
interesting points: The object disappeared after several minutes of observation.
There would be no additional sightings on this date, as the characteristics of the object indicated a natural phenomenon rather than an artificial device.
The witness drew a sketch of a cigar-shaped object with no other details.
The witness estimated the object's speed to be around 1,000 miles per hour and its distance to be 1-3 miles away.
The witness described the object as a craft with flickering lights, very bright and hovering, moving very fast for its apparent size and altitude.
